name: Little Advended Tour
description:
Cool 2D platformer about a little green man traveling across the level, all you need to do is beat the level, find some easter eggs, and many more! you need to wait for the "Many more" this game it's still on the development!!

Current version of the game is 1.1.7

Change log:

  1. - Bug fix -
  2. - Added level 5 and 6 -
  3. - Added 1 easter egg -
  4. More bugs (oh no)
